name: 陳世楷
objective: 使學生學習流體力學基本理論，俾應用於水利工程實務設計與水文觀測分析。課程內容概要包括：(1)緒論、(2)真實流體流動、(3)管流理論、(4)可壓縮性流體、(5)邊界層理論、(6)昇力理論、(7)渠流理論等。
schedule:
週次          單元主題 

 1               Introduction. 
 2               Fluid Properties. 
 3               Fluid Statics. 
 4               Flowing Fluids and Pressure Variation. 
 5               Control Volume Approach and Continuity Equation. 
 6               Momentum Equation. 
 7               The Energy Equation. 
 8               Dimensional Analysis and Similitude. 
 9                 期中考 
 10              Surface Resistance. 
 11              Flow in Conduits. 
 12              Drag and Lift. 
 13              Compressible Flow. 
 14              Flow Measurements. 
 15              Flow Measurements
 16              Turbomachinery. 
 17               Flow in Open Channels. 
 18              期末考
